stockmarket.view

Interface VirtualGambleGUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VirtualGambleGUIImpl

    public interface VirtualGambleGUI
    This interface represents the Graphical User Interface for the Virtual Gamble Application. The GUI is responsible for showing the system response to the user and take inputs from the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void openForm(java.lang.String[] options, java.lang.String choice)
      Method to open a new form to take user inputs.
      void setFeatures(Features features)
      Method to set features provided by this GUI.
      void setVisible(boolean b)
      Method to make the view visible.
      void showGraph()
      Method to show the graphical performance of a portfolio.
      void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Method to show message to the user.

    • Method Detail

      • showMessage

        void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Method to show message to the user.
        Parameters:
        message - message to be shown to user

      • setFeatures

        void setFeatures(Features features)
        Method to set features provided by this GUI.
        Parameters:
        features - object which represent supporting features

      • setVisible

        void setVisible(boolean b)
        Method to make the view visible.
        Parameters:
        b - true to show and false to hide view

      • openForm

        void openForm(java.lang.String[] options,
              java.lang.String choice)
        Method to open a new form to take user inputs.
        Parameters:
        options - the inputs to be taken by user
        choice - this is the action choice corresponding to which user needs to enter inputs
